headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLDSMITH, CLIFFORD H

lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Clifford H. FOJP Service Corporation and its Board of Directors record with sincere sorrow the passing of Clifford Goldsmith, who served on our board for 29 years. Our deepest sympathy is offered to the entire Goldsmith family. Michael Zimmerman Chairman, FOJP
